item.title: How to Disable IPv6 Permanenetly in Linux
item.description: Disable IPv6 Disable IPv6 Temporarily For all Network Interfaces sudo sysctl -w net.ipv6.conf.all.disable_ipv6=1 sudo sysctl -w net.ipv6.conf.default.disable_ipv6=1 For a Specific Network Interface sudo sysctl -w net.ipv6.conf.{eth0}.disable_ipv6=1 Replace {eth0} with teh interface name for which you want to disable the IPv6 Disable IPv6 Permanenetly Modify the /etc/sysctl.conf file to disable IPv6 permanenetly sudo nano /etc/sysctl.conf Then modify the entries as follow For All Network Interfaces net.ipv6.conf.all.disable_ipv6=1 net.ipv6.conf.default.disable_ipv6=1 For a Specific Network Interface net.
